nodes.text: Reprieves is an article written by August Hahn and Cynthia Hahn as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on January 13, 2005 and described an encounter between Darrus Jeht and a Human adept of the Wyrd, Kirasha. Though prepared to kill her to prevent her from uncovering the secret plans of the Tarasin to protect Force-sensitive individuals on Cularin, he was initially unable to do so, as she was meditating and unaware of his presence. Then seeing she was crying and under going an internal repentance of Wyrd ways, he allowed her to live.
In the context of the Living Force campaign, any Jedi player-character were able to absolve a Dark Side point without paying the requisite Force point to do so.
